Write a Python program to print the Fibonacci series
What is the difference between a compiler and an interpreter?
options: A compiler translates a program into machine code before it is run, while an interpreter translates and executes the program one instruction at a time.
A compiler translates a program into machine code before it is run, while an interpreter translates and executes the program all at once.
A compiler translates a program into machine code after it is run, while an interpreter translates and executes the program one instruction at a time.
A compiler translates a program into machine code after it is run, while an interpreter translates and executes the program all at once.
A compiler translates a program into machine code before it is run, while an interpreter translates and executes the program all at once.
questions.correct_answer: A compiler translates a program into machine code before it is run, while an interpreter translates and executes the program one instruction at a time.
